content:
Directions: In the following questions, only one Conclusion is possible and three statements are given. From this you have to take the statements to be true even if they seem to be at variance with commonly known facts and then decide which of the given statement logically follows.
Statements:

All halls are tyres.

Some tyres are wheels.

All wheels are cars.
Conclusions

I. Some cars are wheels.

II. Some cars are tyres.

III. Some wheels are halls.

Only I and II follows

Only III follows

None of the above

Only I follows
